reviewText: good product. good price. quick delivery

I bought this for myself and love it, even my pets like it. I put it on when they are restless and works like a charm. Very good to watch after a stressful day, helps to keep life in perspective. If you work on a computer all day like me is better than reading fine print of the Bible as is easier on the eyes. I am buying some as gifts this Christmas.

This lovely DVD of the Book of Proverbs is simply beautiful! What a great way to relax & listen to the Bible being read to me while viewing gorgeous scenes. The only thing lacking is the written scripture was not shown at all on each verse that he read? But, I will indeed treasure this forever & buy many more other books of the Bible. Need a sense of peace & calm? Get this video!
This is a wonderful dvd.  The places are just gorgous. Listening to Proverbs with the wonderful scenes are just awesome. Loved it.
A great relaxing dvd with the voice of gold. Just watching this will put you in a great frame of mind about the beautiful places in this world.

This DVD has some wonderful Bible verses with beautiful pictures. The only I did not think was that great was the quality of the music. It did not sound like it was recorded very well. The selection of music was good, but the recording quality seemed a little bit low. It could have been my DVD player, but I am not sure.
An enjoyable and relaxing way to listen to the book of Proverbs at a reasonable price. Beautiful scenery and well read.
